name: Hit me with a Super Shotgun
description: A Deathmatch only wad for Doom2. holes for each player to start in. Each person gets Nice, tight wad, high frag count, balanced weapon load at start points.. Small, high speed, best for 2-3 players. Modification of hitmeinf.wad. I don't know who wrote it, but I got if from cdrom.com about 2 years ago....
